item.title: Recommendation of the Council Concerning Guidelines for Cryptography Policy (adopted by the Council at its 895th session on 27 March 1997 [C/M(97)6/PROV])
Wassenaar Arrangement on Export Controls for Conventional Arms and Dual-Use Goods and Technologies
What is the Wassenaar Arrangement?
item.description: Published: February 2020 URL: https://www.wassenaar.org/the-wassenaar-arrangement/ Abstract: The Wassenaar Arrangement (WA), the first global multilateral arrangement on export controls for conventional weapons and sensitive dual-use goods and technologies, received final approval by 33 co-founding countries in July 1996 and began operations in September 1996. The WA was designed to promote transparency, exchange of views and information and greater responsibility in transfers of â€¦ Continued
